form.name: complicated_severe_acute_malnutrition_no_rutf_available
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Malnutrition> Complicated severe acute malnutrition No RUTF Available

field.name: Complicated Severe Acute Malnutrition | Take Action
This classification includes complicated and uncomplicated severe malnutrition
Refer mother/caregiver and child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Administer first dose of amoxycillin, as given below:
Treat the child to prevent low blood sugar
Complete assessment of child, and administer appropriate pre-referral treatments
Fill out referral form. Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
